author: Dylan Gwinn, Dylan Gwinn
title: Report: IOC Member: Tokyo Olympics to Be Postponed Due to Coronavirus
description: International Olympic Committee (IOC) member Dick Pound confirmed what many had been expecting for a long time: the 2020 Tokyo Olympics will be postponed due to the Coronavirus.
content:
International Olympic Committee (IOC) member Dick Pound confirmed what many had been expecting for a long time: the 2020 Tokyo Olympics will be postponed due to the Coronavirus.
